show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: Supplement Pyramid
content:
Host, Dr. Eugene Zampieron, ND, www.drznaturally.com, interviews  Michael A. Smith, M.D.. <!--more--> Dr Smith  is an author and nationally-known media personality.
He is also a blogger, radio talk show host, creates and conducts webinars and appears in informational health and wellness videos.
His engaging ability to present complex medical topics, be it inflammation, diabetes, migraines, food sensitivity or weight management, in a clear, conversational manner has won him a sizable following of anti-aging and disease-prevention enthusiasts.
Also known as “Dr Mike,” he is heard on numerous syndicated national health television and radio shows.
He is a graduate of the University of Texas, Southwestern Medical Center in Dallas, Texas.
On today’s show we will be discussing Dr Mikes new book,MY SUPPLEMENT PYRAMID.  Contact: www.MySupplementPyramid.com
